excerpt: "Indian fintech Zerodha’s CTO Kailash Nadh criticised superfluous, outsized \"We're powered by AI/ML\" marketing which companies were running after. But the recent advancements in AI has altered the hobbyist software developer’s opinion as the company now deviated from its previously held 'no AI approach'."
